testsuite.name: Search tourist attractions

testcase.name: Find where the exit to the Disney attraction in Paris starts

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Starting points do not match - Expected: a string containing "Disneyland Paris, Boulevard de Parc, , Marne-la-Vallee, 77700" but: was "Disneyland Paris, Boulevard de Parc,, Marne-la-Vallee, 77700"
